creator: ebina@pluto.dti.ne.jp
text:
I write some.fo file in Japanese Kanji characters using UTF-8 or Shift_JIS,
and traslate it into some.pdf file by FOP.
All characters show correctly except Japanese Kanji SPACE in output PDF file.
I used "MSMincho" Fonts and msmincho.xml made by TTFReader.
I expect double byte code SPACE like '  ' but I see 'E '.
(Fop-0.18.1)

When I simply translate some.fo file into some.html using some.xsl & XALAN, 
I have no problem with my some.html.
batch transition pre-FOP1.0 resolved+fixed bugs to closed+fixed
creator: gadams@apache.org
